title: George Washington requiring students, staff to get vaccine before fall in-person learning
body: George Washington University announced Monday that it will require students, faculty, and staff who are participating in in-person learning this fall to be fully vaccinated before coming to campus.The , any vaccine authorized for use in the U.S. will be accepted and current students, faculty, and staff have to upload their vaccination cards to the medical portal, according to a release from George Washington. According to George Washington, additional information about the new requirement is available on the school's . The university says that it's strongly encouraging everyone to get a vaccine at their earliest opportunity. For more information on local vaccine resources at George Washington University, .
